task_description: Facing the building to your South (approx. 187Â°), estimate the height of the main building in front of you in meters. Answer with one number and a short rationale.

reason: I need to estimate the height of the building in front of me, so I will first look up to see its full extent from ground to roof.
I can now see the full height of the building, and by counting the floors (approximately 7) and estimating each floor to be about 3.5 meters high, I can calculate the total height.
